item.title: Delta. Need help writing part of some code
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I need to know how to tell the server to give you an item(s) when you click on an object.
something like this:
if (objectID == 2070) {
GET ITEM HERE
} End of code

The problem is. i cant figure out how to make it let you just click on the item and give you stuff. i know how to make it give u items in invo, and xp. i just cant get it to allow you to click the object for everything else to work

Read full topic
